Title: S6 Ep. 233 Johnny Crowder - Cope Notes
Description:
Johnny Crowder is one of the most interesting men you will meet. I met him in 2015 when I was contracted by NAMIGO. He was memorable at that time and even more so now in 2023. Why?

It is his focus on mental wellness and positivity. He is a the founder of Cope Notes,  an app that sends positive mental health messages to help people find balance. 

He is the singer and guitarist in the Christian Metal band - Prison.

A 2x TedX talk speaker that reflects on the flawed thought processes that lead people to consider suicide, and a mental health speaker that encourages people to rethink mental health stigmas.  Reach out to him on LinkedIn also.
